Information

These Texts is a collection of messages Iâ€™ve received from people I know, or knew at some point. The messages are organized chronicallyâ€”each one roughly representing 1 week from the last three years.

The project is roughly inspired by Jamie Livingston, Miranda July, and the slew of similar works already out there.
